skill.name: agent.behaviors.skills.primitives.UndoAlert
skill.description: For an agent to know how to revert the effect of the "Alert" skill on a set of populated areas. Populated areas are visited in the order of the list.

link.name: reach
link.description: To go to a populated area.

link.name: undoAlert
link.description: To enact the decision to revert the effect of Alert on a populated area.

feedback.name: undoAlerted
feedback.description: Sent each time the alert is left on a populated area.

argument.name: populatedArea
argument.description: The area that is no more alerted.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when all "populatedAreas" have been visited.

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent if the set of "populatedAreas" is empty (no element to act on).
